name: Seeing Stars - Alpha Testing
description:
Following in the wake of a GameCube classic:  Kirby Air Ride, Seeing Stars is a spiritual reimagining of what it's like to explore a city in search of a powerful build that sweeps the competition.

Controls:

Movement, steering and looking:  WASD and Mouse  (Gamepad analog stick to move)

Jump/Drift:  Spacebar (Y on xbox 360 controller)

Use hat ability:  Left-Shift (B on xbox 360 controller)

Exit vehicle:  Hold down (S key or down on analog stick) + Jump/Drift button for a brief time to hop out of the vehicle.

NOTICE:

This stage of Seeing Stars is strictly for Alpha testing reasons, and nothing you see will be considered finalized yet.  Expect more updates in the future as I reach a cleaner state of gameplay, before I start getting the visuals up to speed.
